trans-unit.source: Relays workflow instance creation, execution and termination events to the debugger process.
trans-unit.target: 轉送工作流程執行個體的建立、執行和終止事件至偵錯工具處理序。

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class runs in the workflow host application.
trans-unit.target: 此類別的執行個體在工作流程主應用程式 (Host Application) 中執行。

trans-unit.source: It is created by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> if workflow debugging is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 如果啟用工作流程偵錯，則由 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime> 建立。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> of the remoting object running in the debugger process with which the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> communicates.
trans-unit.target: 與 <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> 通訊之偵錯工具處理序中執行的遠端物件 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" />。

trans-unit.source: Establishes the communication channel between the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> object running in the workflow host application and the debugger process.
trans-unit.target: 在執行於工作流程主應用程式的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> 物件和偵錯工具處理序之間建立通訊通道。

trans-unit.source: Establishes a lifetime lease for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> 物件的存留期租用期。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that implements <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease" /> and is used to control the lifetime policy for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 並用於控制 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime.ILease" /> 物件存留期原則的 <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.DebugEngine.DebugController" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value is set to `null` unless this method is overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 除非已在衍生類別中覆寫此方法，否則傳回值將會設定為 `null`。
